Text: Thank you for this. Would you happen to have more of the bloomsbury books. I have 'Bloomsbury keys' Phrases by Nigel Rees and 'Bloomsbury keys' Differences by Laurence Urdang. Have had them for many years, but the print is tiny. I'd prefer to have a soft copy. Very interesting books.

Sector,I have "Bloomsbury Grammar Guide. - Grammar Made Easy 2nd ed."

If Interested,let me know :)

Not necessary BBS. I have saved you the trouble. :) I searched and downloaded it.
I glanced through it. It is a very nice book. Thank you.
